name: Wood Lands
description:
Better Graphics On Downloaded Version

Wood Lands is a simple game where your stuck on an island and farm materials and build! This game is in development and might be updated. This game was made in less than 1 week for The Explosive Jam.

How to play:

Gain wood by chopping trees then press one and right click to build!

Made by: EvanDoesDev - YouTube

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/F8vqja92y9
